subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Ralph's Research/EVP_says_Pray_for-this_World_then_female-says_Maury.wav 
  Uploaded by : ghostthostt <Ralphsmi@...> 
  Description : Just got this EVP on House Investigation in Turbotville PA says " Pray for this World " female says "Maury" 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Ralph%27s%20Research/EVP_says_Pray_for-this_World_then_female-says_Maury.wav

Regards,
